A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Worst Star Wars movie. As a die hard fan\, I was so excited for this. The editing was sloppy and the plot lines were stupid. Snoke was a waste of time\, Finn and Rose's plot line was a waste of time\, and they completely wasted Luke. I am so incredibly disappointed with this film. The Force Awakens was much better than this\, and that's saying something.
